headline: Could New Bitcoin Volatility Indices Enhance CME Group's (CME) Role in Crypto Risk Management?
summary: CF Benchmarks and CME Group recently announced the December 2 launch of two bitcoin volatility indices, the CME CF Bitcoin Volatility Index – Real Time (BVX) and the CME CF Bitcoin Volatility Index – Settlement (BVXS), which offer market-based, forward-looking measures of bitcoin's expected price fluctuations over a 30-day period, using data from CME's regulated bitcoin options. This expansion adds new transparency and risk management tools for institutional investors in digital assets,...
